data.description: Syntactic sugar to use Prolog data from Perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows to create Prolog terms from Perl with a sintax
    very similar to that of Prolog.

    It's just syntactic sugar and so, I have called it
    Language::Prolog::Sugar

    - Salva
